channel.title: 100 compile errors

item.title: 100 compile errors
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Check your brackets before the command. You may either have an extra one or you’re missing one.

Read full topic

item.title: 100 compile errors
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Try this…

{ }if (command.startsWith("rules")) { sendQuest("@bla@Welcome To KinglesScape" + playerName + "!", 8147); sendQuest("@red@Please Follow These Rules!", 8148); sendQuest("@bla@Rule 1: No Spamming/Trolling!", 8149); sendQuest("@red@Rule 2: Respect All Staff Members! They Earned Their Spot!", 8150); sendQuest("@bla@Rule 3: No Advertising!", 8151); sendQuest("@red@Rule 4: No Pornographic Content!", 8152); sendQuest("@bla@Rule 5: Follow All Rules For Each Area!", 8153); sendQuest("@red@Thank You For Your Time! Have Fun!", 8154); sendQuest("@bla@~KinglesScape Staff~", 8155); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

Read full topic

item.title: 100 compile errors
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

Okay i was browsing through this forums and i saw this code

if (command.startsWith("rules")) { sendQuest("@bla@Welcome To KinglesScape" + playerName + "!", 8147); sendQuest("@red@Please Follow These Rules!", 8148); sendQuest("@bla@Rule 1: No Spamming/Trolling!", 8149); sendQuest("@red@Rule 2: Respect All Staff Members! They Earned Their Spot!", 8150); sendQuest("@bla@Rule 3: No Advertising!", 8151); sendQuest("@red@Rule 4: No Pornographic Content!", 8152); sendQuest("@bla@Rule 5: Follow All Rules For Each Area!", 8153); sendQuest("@red@Thank You For Your Time! Have Fun!", 8154); sendQuest("@bla@~KinglesScape Staff~", 8155); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

And it didnt work so then i deleted it

and now i get this

http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=30wqzh2&s=5
